segments.text: I gaze at this domestic kitchen moment captured so well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is engrossed in her routine task by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She holds the plate steady, wiping it clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All the while, the sink overflows behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water floods out, wetting the floor and doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, unnoticed by her calm expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight streams in from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks serene with its fence and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark opposite to the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the children catch my eye on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy perches unstably on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches to plunder the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens from this carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
